title: 'Not sustainable': Trump admits folly of tariffs; what 'forced' trade war with China
content: President Trump declared his proposed 100% tariff on Chinese goods unsustainable, blaming Beijing's unfair practices for forcing his hand. He accused China of years of exploitation and stated that only strength is respected. Despite this, a potential tariff pause was hinted at, with 85 senators reportedly backing up to 500% tariffs on Chinese purchases of Russian oil.

title: Delhi-Dhaka spat: Deaths of 3 B'deshis in Tripura sparks tiff; MEA reacts
content: India and Bangladesh are embroiled in a diplomatic dispute following the killing of three Bangladeshis in Tripura. Dhaka condemned the "brutal beating and killing" as a "grave violation of human rights," while India stated the deceased were "smugglers" who attacked villagers. New Delhi urged Dhaka to uphold border sanctity and prevent cross-border crimes.

title: Bihar polls: MGB misses 'deadline' for seat deal; does it spell big trouble?
content: Bihar's opposition Mahagathbandhan faces scrutiny over delayed seat-sharing talks, with the NDA appearing organized. Alliance leaders, however, insist the delay signifies expansion, not disarray, citing coordination complexities. Despite some candidate overlaps, leaders express confidence in forming a government, drawing parallels to past successful alliances.

title: Agarkar on his role as chief selector: 'There is nothing else in your hand'
content: BCCI chief selector Ajit Agarkar described his role as the most challenging compared to playing and commentary. He highlighted the immense pressure and responsibility of shaping careers, acknowledging that decisions can impact players significantly. Agarkar also addressed the popularity of cricket in India, leading to widespread criticism of selection choices.

title: Code Red at Google: ChatGPT beat Google; Sundar Pichai recalls
content: Google CEO Sundar Pichai revealed an internal "code red" following OpenAI's ChatGPT launch, prompting founders Larry Page and Sergey Brin to return. The company dramatically reshaped its AI strategy, launching Bard (now Gemini) and reassigning over 20 AI initiatives to counter the existential threat to its search empire.

title: 'Like a movie': Cop saves drunk woman from a fiery car crash – Caught on cam
content: A Mesquite police officer, Tyler Ingram, heroically rescued a suspected drunk driver from her burning car on I-30. Bodycam footage captured Ingram forcing open the door and pulling the woman to safety moments before the vehicle was engulfed in flames. The woman, who sustained injuries, is expected to recover and faces DWI charges.

title: Ladakh violence: MHA orders judicial probe; move comes day ahead of Leh body march
content: The Home Ministry has ordered a judicial probe by retired SC judge B S Chauhan into the September 24 Ladakh violence that claimed four lives. This follows protests demanding statehood and autonomy, with activists like Sonam Wangchuk arrested. Talks were called off by protesters seeking a probe and the release of detainees, disputing claims of normalcy.

title: Microsoft sets 2026 'China deadline' for suppliers, instructs: Help prepare ...
content: Microsoft is reportedly planning a significant shift in its hardware manufacturing, aiming to produce the majority of its upcoming products outside of China by 2026. This expansive initiative includes Surface laptops and data center servers, with a focus on sourcing components and assembly internationally.

title: Why firecrackers are horrible for dogs
content: For millions of dogs, Diwali is not a festival of light. It is a night of noise and terror, a prolonged panic attack that no amount of comforting words can soothe. What we call tradition, they experience as trauma. And the reason lies not in weakness or over-sensitivity, but in the very biology that humans helped shape — a physiology honed over millennia for survival, now caught in a storm it cannot understand.

title: Vande Bharat sleeper train 2025: First look, features, routes
content: India's premium overnight Vande Bharat Sleeper train is set to revolutionize long-distance travel. Featuring a 16-coach prototype with AC 3-Tier, AC 2-Tier, and AC First Class, it will accommodate over 1,100 passengers. Designed for speeds up to 180 km/h, the train promises enhanced comfort and modern amenities, with initial routes connecting Delhi to Ahmedabad, Bhopal, and Patna.

title: MacKenzie Scott cuts Amazon stake by 42%; now holds $12.6bn; prioritises equity work
content: MacKenzie Scott has significantly reduced her Amazon stake, cutting holdings by nearly 42% to $12.6 billion. This reduction occurred despite Amazon's stock performance and follows her extensive philanthropic efforts, which have heavily focused on diversity, equity, and inclusion initiatives. The exact reasons for the stake reduction, whether sales or donations, remain unspecified.

title: UK launches first digital ID: Is it similar to India's Aadhaar? Full details
content: The UK government has launched a digital ID scheme, initially for former armed services members, with plans to expand it for all citizens to verify their right to work. This app-based system aims to reduce illegal immigration by making it harder to use stolen or borrowed National Insurance numbers for employment.

title: 2027 ODI WC? Head makes bold Kohli, Rohit future predictions
content: Australian cricketer Travis Head lauded Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma as premier white-ball talents, with Kohli hailed as the greatest. Head expressed admiration for Sharma's batting, seeing him as a role model for openers. Axar Patel echoed confidence in their readiness for the upcoming India-Australia series, highlighting their professional approach and recent strong performances.

title: ‘Never gave anaesthesia’: Cops probe another woman's role in Bengaluru doctor’s murder
content: A surgical resident, Dr. Mahendra Reddy G S, has been arrested and remanded in custody for the alleged murder of his wife, dermatologist Dr. Kritika M Reddy. He is accused of administering an anaesthetic overdose, with forensic reports confirming the presence of Propofol in her viscera. Investigators are examining his motive and how he procured the drug.

title: UPenn on Trump ‘compact’: Alma mater says no; chooses academic freedom over control
content: The University of Pennsylvania, Donald Trump’s alma mater, has rejected his administration’s “Compact for Academic Excellence,” a proposed funding-linked deal requiring tuition freezes, limits on international students, and protections for conservative speech. Joining MIT, Brown, and USC, UPenn cited academic freedom and autonomy concerns, marking a symbolic blow as Trump’s former university rebuffs his education policy.

title: Exclusive | Sharad Kelkar reveals what he gifts his wife her every Dhanteras
content: Actor Sharad Kelkar is gearing up for Diwali, highlighting his wife Keerti as the 'light of his life' who simplifies his world. He revealed that Keerti selects her own Dhanteras gift, a tradition he meticulously plans for. Kelkar also emphasizes extending Diwali's joy and prosperity to his long-serving staff with bonuses and gifts, believing the festival signifies happiness for everyone.

title: Agarkar reveals why Shami missed Australia tour: 'We were desperate'
content: Former chief selector Ajit Agarkar cited fitness concerns for Mohammed Shami's exclusion from the England series and the recent Australia ODI tour. Shami, however, expressed his readiness to play, stating his participation in domestic matches indicates his fitness. Agarkar indicated that Shami's availability for future tours depends on his fitness over the next two months.

title: BBC Gaza documentary controversy: Why Ofcom called it a 'serious breach'
content: BBC has been found to have misled audiences by UK regulator Ofcom over its Gaza documentary. The 13-year-old narrator's father was a Hamas official, a crucial detail omitted. This ruling, a rare and serious rebuke, highlights transparency issues and has intensified scrutiny on the BBC's journalistic integrity in sensitive reporting.

title: Happy Diwali 2025: Top 60 wishes, messages to light up the celebrations
content: Diwali, the festival of lights, is celebrated with great fervor, symbolizing hope, knowledge, and love. Families gather to share happiness, exchange gifts, and create lasting memories. The article provides 50 wishes, messages, and quotes to help express gratitude and spread joy during this auspicious occasion.

title: Spy games: The Chinese espionage case that is rocking UK govt - explained
content: A high-stakes legal battle is unfolding in Britain after a spying case against two Britons collapsed. Accused of espionage for China, the prosecution faltered on a technicality. This has sparked sharp criticism from intelligence chiefs and government officials who label China a significant threat. The incident raises crucial questions about national security and the UK's approach to China.

title: IND vs AUS: Shocking numbers! Rohit-Virat fever reaches Australia
content: The Men's ODI Series between Australia and India has officially launched at Perth Stadium. Players from both nations gathered for a photo session, celebrating their historic cricket rivalry. The series begins on Saturday, October 19, at Perth Stadium. Over 175,000 tickets have already been sold for the white-ball series, indicating significant fan interest.

title: Dhanteras 2025: Date, shubh muhurat to bring home Laxmi-Ganesh idols, broomsticks
content: Dhanteras, on October 18, 2025, marks the auspicious start of Diwali festivities, symbolizing the victory of light over darkness. Families traditionally buy gold, silver, and idols of Lakshmi and Ganesh, believed to invoke prosperity and remove obstacles. The day also involves rituals and purchasing broomsticks to sweep away negativity, setting a positive tone for the celebrations.

title: Dense forests no longer safe for Naxals; over 200 Maoists lay down arms
content: Over 200 Maoists, including key figures, surrendered in Chhattisgarh's Bastar, marking a significant turning point in the fight against Naxalism. Union Home Minister Amit Shah declared Abujhmarh and North Bastar free from Naxal terror, attributing the success to the government's dual approach of pressure and surrender incentives.

title: 'Shameful decision!': Fans banned; Israeli fans attack British officials
content: British officials face pressure to reverse a ban on Maccabi Tel Aviv supporters attending a match at Aston Villa due to security concerns. Israel's foreign minister called the decision "shameful," while the UK Prime Minister emphasised zero tolerance for antisemitism. Police cited intelligence and previous violent incidents as reasons for the high-risk classification.

title: Gwalior hospital: Worms found in govt-supplied kids’ Azithromycin syrup
content: In a startling turn of events, authorities in Madhya Pradesh have issued a statewide warning following the alarming discovery of worms in a government-provided antibiotic syrup intended for children. Health officials have immediately ceased the distribution of the implicated Azithromycin Oral Suspension and have launched an extensive investigation.

title: 'Fake news': Virat Kohli's brother on Instagram; hits out at 'misinformation'
content: Virat Kohli's brother, Vikas, sarcastically addressed rampant misinformation and fake news circulating online. This social media post emerged amidst reports suggesting the cricketer and his wife, Anushka Sharma, were planning a permanent move to the UK, even transferring power of attorney for their Gurugram property.

title: MrBeast meets Bollywood trio SRK, Salman and Aamir
content: Internet sensation MrBeast, also known as Jimmy Donaldson, has ignited a frenzy with a picture alongside Bollywood titans Shah Rukh Khan, Salman Khan, and Aamir Khan in Saudi Arabia. His cryptic caption, "Hey India, should we all do something together?", has fans buzzing with speculation about a massive upcoming collaboration, potentially uniting global and Indian entertainment.

title: Hayden on India captaincy - 'Rohit becomes vulnerable because of ... '
content: Former Australian cricketer Matthew Hayden shared his thoughts on Rohit Sharma's ODI captaincy change. He noted the selectors' focus on age and the strategic move to bring Shubman Gill into leadership. Hayden highlighted the immense experience of Rohit and Virat Kohli returning for the Australian series. He also emphasized India's balanced team composition, blending youth and experience.

title: Indian pharma eyes Russian market: Firms explore localised production
content: Indian pharmaceutical companies are exploring opportunities to establish production facilities across Russia, with productive negotiations underway for joint ventures. This move aims to leverage India's expertise and Russia's market potential, fostering self-sufficiency in pharmaceuticals and other key sectors through complementary strengths.

title: 'Rammed vehicle into wall': Suicide attack on Pak army's camp; viral video shows huge blast
content: A deadly suicide attack struck a Pakistan military camp in North Waziristan on Friday, killing seven soldiers. Terrorists attempted to storm the facility, with one detonating an explosives-laden vehicle. This incident follows intense clashes between Pakistan and Afghanistan. A fragile ceasefire is now in place, brokered by the Afghan Taliban regime.

title: Taylor Swift, Travis Kelce’s rumored prenup to protect $1.6bn empire before ‘I do’
content: As Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce prepare for their wedding, speculation surrounds their reported prenup. With Swift's $1.6 billion net worth and Kelce's $70 million, a "Title Controls" agreement is likely, ensuring individual assets like Swift's music catalog and Kelce's businesses remain separate. This smart financial planning protects their empires.

title: 151 million year old fly fossil changes insect evolution as we know it
content: A remarkable 151-million-year-old fly fossil found in China is changing our view of insect evolution. This ancient insect, preserved in amber, shows unique features not seen in modern species. Its discovery offers new insights into how insects diversified during the Jurassic period. The fossil also provides a glimpse into the mid-Jurassic ecosystem, revealing complex interactions and adaptations from that era.

title: Gujarat cabinet reshuffle: Surat MLA Harsh Sanghavi takes oath as deputy CM; see full list
content: Gujarat BJP conducted a major cabinet reshuffle, with 16 ministers resigning and a new 26-member cabinet sworn in, including Deputy Chief Minister Harsh Sanghavi. This significant change comes ahead of crucial local body elections and nearly three years into Chief Minister Bhupendra Patel's current term.

title: Explained: Where is the Asia Cup trophy? When and how will India get it?
content: Despite winning the Asia Cup 2025, India has not received their trophy due to a controversy involving ACC president Mohsin Naqvi. The silverware remains locked in the ACC office after India declined to accept it from Naqvi, who insists on presenting it personally. A resolution is expected at an upcoming ACC meeting.

title: Total Chess World Championship Tour: No freestyle? No women's edition
content: FIDE has approved the "Total Chess World Championship Tour," a new format by Norway Chess, combining Fast Classical, Rapid, and Blitz to find the "Total Chess Player."  The tour, featuring four events annually with a $2.7 million prize pool, aims to innovate chess. A pilot event is set for autumn 2026, with the full season in 2027.

title: Why Maccabi Tel Aviv fans were banned from Europa League match at Aston Villa
content: Maccabi Tel Aviv fans are banned from attending their Europa League match against Aston Villa due to security concerns, including threats of antisemitic attacks and protests. This decision, supported by West Midlands Police, has drawn criticism from political and Jewish organizations, highlighting the growing politicization of sports events and the need to balance fan safety with access.

title: 3rd attack in 4 months: Why gangsters are targeting Kapil Sharma's Canada café
content: In a troubling escalation, Kapil Sharma's Kap's Cafe in Canada has been targeted for the third time, this time captured in a shocking video showing a vehicle firing at the venue. Adding to the tension, a post on social media, linked to associates of gangster Lawrence Bishnoi, threatened retaliation against debtors and critics alike.

title: Bengaluru: Student raped inside engineering college's men's washroom
content: A shocking incident unfolded at a private college in Bengaluru where a 21-year-old engineering student was arrested for allegedly raping a female classmate in a men's washroom. The alleged assault occurred on October 10th, with the survivor filing a complaint five days later.

title: IRCTC tatkal: Last-minute trip plan in festive season? Top points on ticket booking
content: Indian Railways braces for a surge in passengers during Diwali and Chhath, especially in Northern India. Securing Tatkal tickets remains a challenge due to high demand. Advance preparation, utilizing IRCTC's master list, quick payment options, and exploring alternative trains are key strategies for travelers. The article outlines a step-by-step booking process for Tatkal tickets.

title: Diwali 2025 Rangoli designs: Stunning ideas to brighten up your festivities
content: Diwali 2025 approaches with vibrant rangoli designs. Explore flower, diya, geometric, and peacock themes. Add glitter, stones, or religious motifs for auspiciousness. Discover layered, eco-friendly, 3D, and personalized creations. Tips for perfect rangoli include planning, quality materials, starting from the center, and using lights. Brighten your home with these festive floor art ideas.

title: Our guide to every Week 7 NFL game: Matchup previews, predictions, picks and nuggets
content: Offense showdown in Bucs-Lions? Who wins Jayden Daniels vs. Dak Prescott? We have picks, predictions, storylines and stat nuggets for every Week 7 game.

title: Flacco savors Bengals' victory after uncertainty
content: Following his benching in Cleveland and his trade to Cincinnati, Joe Flacco said the opportunity to lead the Bengals to a comeback win was "pretty special."

title: Myers leaves ESPN, joins Harris-led sports group
content: Ex-Warriors GM Bob Myers is leaving ESPN to become president of sports for Harris Blitzer Sports & Entertainment.

title: Records: Gambling group targeted college hoops
content: As the NCAA and federal authorities investigate alleged point-shaving in college basketball, the documents reveal new details about the behavior of an alleged gambling syndicate and the games suspected members targeted.

title: Fiery Scherzer helps Jays tie up series with M's
content: Max Scherzer, making his first start of the postseason, led Toronto over Seattle on Thursday night to even the ALCS at two games apiece.

title: F1 announces new Apple TV U.S. broadcast deal
content: Apple TV has signed an exclusive deal to be the broadcaster of Formula 1 in the United States from 2026, it was announced on Friday.

title: Parsons calls out one-sided officiating, tush push
content: Micah Parsons made his feelings known Thursday on offensive players getting away with holding far too often and his disdain for the Eagles' tush push play.

title: Phillies' brass hopes Harper can be 'elite' again
content: Phillies president of baseball operations Dave Dombrowski wonders if two-time NL MVP Bryce Harper can return to "elite" form with six years left on his 13-year, $330 million deal.

title: Dodgers 1 win away from return to World Series
content: Tommy Edman hit a tiebreaking single off hard-throwing rookie Jacob Misiorowski in a two-run sixth inning, and the Dodgers beat the Brewers 3-1 on Thursday to take a 3-0 lead in the NL Championship Series.

title: 🏈 NFL trades: Barnwell's 13 pre-deadline moves
content: Jakobi Meyers to the NFC East? Trey Hendrickson and Jaelan Phillips to the same team? Russell Wilson to a contender? Let's build 13 win-win trades.

title: Ready for another wild weekend? The 32 games that demand your attention
content: Ole Miss-Georgia, Bama-Tennessee, LSU-Vandy, plus USC-Notre Dame and more make for a jam-packed weekend.

title: Wetzel: The NFL's Bill Belichick skepticism is being validated in Chapel Hill
content: An NFC personnel director told ESPN that Belichick comes up "within the first five minutes" of every conversation.

title: 'There's no Steph without Steve': Steph Curry and Steve Kerr reflect on 11 seasons together
content: As Curry and Kerr enter their 12th season together, they reflect on what forged their bond and what comes next.

title: Olney: How the Mariners' plan unraveled in Game 4 -- and what it means for Game 5
content: Dan Wilson wanted to be aggressive with Seattle's bullpen on Thursday. But will it come back to haunt him?

title: The NHL's small-sample shock teams: Who has under- and overperformed?
content: We explore what has happened (good or bad) for seven particular teams -- and predict whether it'll continue.

title: 'Change is a must': WNBA owners, insiders on Cathy Engelbert, officiating, CBA
content: Have owners and executives lost faith in the WNBA commissioner? We canvassed insiders on the biggest topics at the WNBA Finals.

title: Can Dortmund keep pace with Bayern? We're about to find out
content: Perfect Bayern, unbeaten Dortmund, first vs. second: Der Klassiker doesn't need extra fanfare. This is a meeting of the best in the Bundesliga.

title: How Louisville QB Miller Moss put USC behind him to keep chasing his NFL dreams
content: Miller Moss' career at USC crashed last year. How far will Louisville's QB go to stay after his NFL dreams?

title: The Bush Push revisited: A time capsule of the iconic Notre Dame-USC matchup, 20 years later
content: The Bush Push was more than just an iconic moment in the USC-Notre Dame rivalry -- its aftershocks affected both teams, the 2005 postseason and the rulebook.

title: Don't be surprised if ... Jaxon Smith-Njigba hits 2K, TreVeyon Henderson breaks out
content: Will Seattle's star receiver can keep up his impressive pace? Is a breakout game ahead for a Patriots rookie?

title: Which teams benefitted most from the transfer portal -- or didn't?
content: Which programs over- or underperformed in the portal ahead of the 2025-26 season based on previous cycles?

title: 2025-26 nonconference impact games
content: There's plenty of star power to watch early this season -- including a potential Final Four quartet in Las Vegas.

title: Expert picks, best bets: Can Reinier de Ridder continue his 2025 win streak?
content: ESPN MMA experts make their predictions and give betting tips for UFC Fight Night from Vancouver, British Columbia.

title: Are Man United too big to fail? The answer might surprise you
content: Where do you begin with fixing Man United? From coaching to player identification to infrastructure, what's the first place to start? We asked some industry insiders and experts for their takes.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Liverpool eye Dortmund center back Nico Schlotterbeck
content: Liverpool are prepared to pursue Borussia Dortmund center back Nico Schlotterbeck. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: Florida's throwbacks, Oregon's all-white look lead Week 8 college football uniforms
content: Multiple teams are rocking throwbacks in Week 8 of the college football season, led by the Florida Gators.

title: Talent, emotional intelligence and a lifetime of sacrifice have made Oscar Piastri a F1 title favorite
content: There's no doubting Oscar Piastri's talent, but what's set him apart in his F1 title quest is his ability to control his emotions.

title: "Old Global Order Gone, There Will Be More Multipolarity": Rishi Sunak To NDTV On Tariffs
content: The old global order that people of his generation grew up with "is gone" and the focus will now be on multipolarity and domestic capabilities, former UK Prime Minister Sunak has said.

title: Video: With Belts, Dustbins, WWE-Style Royal Rumble At Delhi Train Station
content: In a scene that has stunned commuters and gone viral across social media, a group of Indian Railways Catering and Tourism Corporation (IRCTC) employees were caught on camera engaging in a violent brawl on the platform of Delhi's Nizamuddin Station.

title: Rishi Sunak Reveals Who Gives Him Better Advice, Mother-In-Law Or Father-In-Law
content: When former UK Prime Minister Rishi Sunak was asked a fun and personal question, who gives him better advice, his mother-in-law Sudha Murty or his father-in-law Narayana Murthy, he had an answer that was thoughtful.

title: NDTV World Summit 2025 LIVE: India Stood By Sri Lanka During 2022 Economic Crisis, Says Amarasuriya
content: NDTV Global World Summit 2025 LIVE Updates: The 2025 edition of the NDTV World Summit - NDTV's flagship event - began today, featuring a host of leaders, including Prime Minister Narendra Modi.

title: Zelensky To Seek Weapons From Trump In The Shadow Of New Putin Summit
content: US President Donald Trump will discuss the possible supply of Tomahawk missiles to Ukraine with President Volodymyr Zelensky on Friday but the surprise announcement of a new US-Russian summit cast doubt over the prospect.

title: After Military Power Grab, Army Colonel Becomes Madagascar's President
content: Army colonel Michael Randrianirina was sworn in as Madagascar's president on Friday, just days after a military power grab that sent ex-president Andry Rajoelina fleeing and raised international alarm about a new coup on the island.

title: Diwali 2025: Rangoli Pattern Takes Centre Stage On Canada Posts New Stamp
content: Canada Post has released a new stamp to celebrate Diwali 2025, continuing an annual tradition which began in 2017. The stamp showcases a Rangoli pattern and features the word "Diwali" in both Hindi and English.

title: High Court Judge And Lawyer In Heated Exchange In Jharkhand. Video Viral
content: An acrimonious exchange between a Jharkhand High Court judge and a lawyer on Thursday has led to the filing of a criminal contempt case against the lawyer.

title: Secret Russian Files Reveal Moscow, US Tried To 'Bridge The Gap', Literally
content: A 350-page Russian document on the assassination of former US President John F. Kennedy is grabbing lots of eyeballs, not for what it says about the 1963 assassination, but for a map of a bridge once planned to link Russia and the United States.

title: Argentine Opposition Leader Dies Of Heart Attack During Live Debate
content: Argentine ex-congressman and radical candidate Hernan Damiani died on Thursday after suffering a heart attack during a live broadcast debate. He was 63.

title: 3 ABVP Members Arrested For Secretly Filming Women Students Changing Clothes
content: Three students of a government college were arrested for allegedly secretly recording women while they were changing clothes ahead of a cultural event in Madhya Pradesh.

title: Punjab Cop With 50-Plus Properties, 7.5 Crore Cash, Luxury Cars And More
content: Crores in cash, mounds of gold jewellery, luxury watches, over immovable property and luxury cars --- a raid by the Central Bureau of Investigation at the home of senior Punjab police officer Harcharan Singh Bhullar has revealed unexplained wealth.

title: In Sabarimala Gold Theft Case, Remand Report Points To Larger Conspiracy
content: The nine-page remand report in the sensational Sabarimala gold theft case has laid bare the scale of the crime and also points to a broader conspiracy.

title: In Patna, Amit Shah Punches Holes In Tejashwi Yadav's Government Jobs Promise
content: Union home minister Amit Shah, who is on a three-day visit to Bihar ahead of the assembly election, took on Rashtriya Janata Dal's Tejashwi Yadav and Congress's Rahul Gandhi today.

title: "Are They Brihaspati?" Siddaramaiah vs Murthys Over Karnataka Caste Survey
content: Karnataka Chief Minister Siddaramaiah has launched a public retort to Infosys founder NR Narayana Murthy and author Sudha Murty, accusing them of misunderstanding the intent of the state's non-mandatory social and educational survey.

title: PM Modi Meets Sri Lankan PM, Both Leaders To Attend NDTV World Summit Today
content: Innovation, women's empowerment, welfare of fishermen were among subjects discussed with Sri Lankan Prime Minister Harini Amarasuriya, said Prime Minister Narendra Modi as he welcomed the Sri Lankan leader at his residence on Friday.

title: 4 Dead After Ambulance Overturns In UP's Sitapur: Cops
content: An ambulance, which lost control after its tyre burst, hit several people and killed four, including a woman, in Sitapur district on Friday morning, police said.

title: "We Were Working On Chatbot Too": Sundar Pichai On Google's Missed AI Moment
content: Google CEO Sundar Pichai recently opened up about what it was like to lead the company that pioneered many of the technologies behind today's AI revolution - only to be overtaken in the public eye by OpenAI's ChatGPT.

title: 2 Children Die In Madhya Pradesh Due To Wrong Treatment By Quacks
content: In two separate incidents that have shaken Madhya Pradesh, two children have died allegedly due to negligence and wrong treatment by quacks.

title: Who Is Rivaba Jadeja? Cricketer's Wife Sworn In As Gujarat Cabinet Minister
content: Rivaba Jadeja, wife of cricketer Ravindra Jadeja and MLA from Jamnagar North, was inducted into the Gujarat Cabinet on Friday.

title: APSRTC employees plan State-wide protest for promotions from October 23
content: Union leaders accuse the officers concerned of delaying the release of relevant G.O. despite the Chief Minister approving the demand

title: Net zero carbon campaign progressing in 152 local bodies
content: Haritha Keralam Mission’s initiative focusses on reducing the emission of greenhouse gases through interventions in the energy, waste management and agriculture sectors as well as in land use patterns.

title: Medical college doctors in Kerala to boycott outpatient clinics on Monday
content: KGMCTA says they are forced to resort to this strike as the government had been dismissive about their long-standing demands and silent protests

title: Palaniswami blames Tamil Nadu government’s ‘negligence’ for cough syrup deaths in M.P.
content: He alleges that the T.N. government did not carry out inspections at the Kancheepuram-based company in 2024 and 2025

title: UKG student not allowed to board school bus for delay in fee payment in Malappuram, mother alleges inhuman treatment by headmistress
content: The child’s mother has lodged complaints with the Education Minister, State Commission for Protection of Child Rights, and the police

title: Centre is biased against Tamil Nadu in funds allocation, infrastructure projects, says Thangam Thennarasu
content: To drive home his point, the Finance Minister says the Centre has withheld nearly ₹4,000 crore earmarked for school education and released only ₹450 crore for implementing the Right to Education Act. The State, he says, has been paying for teacher salaries, student programmes, and school infrastructure from its own resources

title: Andhra Pradesh Deputy Chief Minister Pawan Kalyan calls for steps to improve lives and incomes of fishermen in Kakinada district
content: Enquiring about the 100-day action plan to uplift the fishing communities, he says focus should be on providing better facilities and imparting training in advanced fishing techniques

title: Egypt's Foreign Minister meets PM Modi
content: “India-Egypt Strategic Partnership continues to grow from strength to strength for the benefit of our people,” PM Modi said

title: ‘Operation Numkhor’ exposes chinks in the system
content: Majority of the high-end, pre-owned cars confiscated from various parts of the State has not paid any road tax or special fees as mandated by the Motor Vehicles department

title: Island villages struggle to ‘make ends meet’
content: Surrounded by the river Krishna and the Bay of Bengal, these villages in Krishna district can be reached by a lone punt which operates 22 times a day. Decline in business due to unpredictable weather and lack of basic amenities has forced many villagers to migrate to cities in search of work. Nellore Sravani visits Nagayalanka’s island villages to explore the reasons

title: BJP offices should become ‘Janata Garages’, says its Andhra Pradesh State president Madhav
content: The party’s ideology and achievements, and the welfare schemes rolled out under Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s leadership should reach every household, he says

title: CPI(M) accuses Congress of unleashing street violence to hide the latter’s worsening internal dissensions
content: KPCC’s latest reorganisation has widened factional fissures in Congress, with beleaguered leadership seeking temporary solace in street violence to escape ‘flailing political fortunes’ in the crucial election year, says Govindan.

title: Nirmala directs banks to issue Kisan Credit Cards to all farmers by December-end
content: The Union Finance Minister inaugurates agro-processing centre in Vijayanagara established with funds from MPLADS and NABARD

title: Kerala HC declines to stay DDE directive to CBSE school to let student attend classes while wearing hijab
content: The court also seeks State government’s response to the school’s contention that the government is not empowered to issue such a directive to schools that follow the CBSE syllabus

title: Punjab DIG Harcharan Singh Bhullar sent to 14-day judicial custody in bribery case
content: The CBI had arrested Mr. Bhullar along with his associate Kirshanu Sharda in a bribery case involving ₹8 lakh

title: Hyderabad man forced to fight war in Ukraine; wife seeks govt. intervention
content: Mohammed Ahmed’s wife said he is breadwinner of the family, which includes his paralysed mother, herself and their two children, aged 10 and four

title: ‘True freedom can be achieved only when slavery of the mind is eradicated’
content: The Chair for Dalit Studies of Kannada University and Eedina.com jointly organise a special lecture titled ‘Arive Ambedkar’ in Hampi

title: Tails of terror: Animal warriors in Hyderabad brace for Deepavali’s dark side
content: Helplines of animal rescue groups ring nonstop as the festival of lights means blinding lights and deafening noise for animals and birds, leaving them scurrying for cover

title: Three Army personnel injured in ULFA(I) attack in Assam
content: Outlawed outfit claims responsibility, says assault part of ‘Operation Vengeance’ following alleged drone strike in July

title: Questioning of 10 accused in Mulakalacheruvu spurious liquor case begins
content: Following court order, investigating officers take custody of the accused from the Madanapalle sub-jail, where they are in remand

title: ‘Neer Nira’ project for recharging of borewells
content: The project aims to nurture groundwater sources with government subsidy and will  be implemented in Chittur block in Palakkad and Kattappana block in Idukki initially

title: Parents’ body welcomes formation of panel to curb student suicides in Andhra Pradesh
content: Five student suicides in SPSR Nellore district over four months underscore the urgent need for preventive steps and a thorough investigation, says PAAP

title: Railways issue advisory against fraudulent job offers
content: Railways flag attempts by certain individuals to deceive job aspirants by promising employment in Railways in lieu of money

title: CPI(M) to give critical responsibilities to veterans without infringing on the 75-year age cap for inclusion in top committees
content: CPI(M) seeks to pre-empt Opposition parties from politically manipulating the controversy surrounding the veteran leader G. Sudhakaran’s public admission that he felt isolated and unwanted in the party in Alappuzha.

title: Naidu calls for evaluation of A.P.’s mineral wealth, moots mining lease quota for Vaddera community
content: State can generate up to ₹30,000 crore revenue by emulating Odisha which earns over ₹50,000 crore annually from minerals through value-added processing, says Chief Minister

title: Sri Lankan PM Harini Amarasuriya meets PM Modi in New Delhi
content: "As close neighbours, our cooperation holds immense importance for the prosperity of our two peoples as well as the shared region," Mr. Modi said

title: AI-based facial recognition attendance for staff of govt., aided schools and PU colleges in Karnataka
content: FRA has already been implemented as a pilot project for three months in schools and PU Colleges in Mandya, Haveri and Bengaluru South Districts

title: T.N. CM Stalin announces Commission to make recommendations for law against ‘honour’ killings, caste-based hate crimes
content: Mr. Stalin said the Commission, headed by retired Madras High Court judge Justice K.N. Basha, will comprise legal experts, progressive thinkers, and eminent sociologists

title: Yatnal seeks ban on namaz in public places, govt premises
content: Uniform enforcement of measures will reinforce the State’s commitment to secularism, equality before the law, and public order, says the expelled BJP leaderf

title: Tension at village in Chittoor district after clash between rival belt shop operators
content: One injured as liquor pricing dispute turns violent at S.S. Konda in Gangadhara Nellore mandal; police investigating possible link to spurious liquor trade

title: T.N. govt acted swiftly to ban Coldrif syrup, seal pharma unit: Health Minister
content: The Health Minister was responding to a Calling Attention Motion moved by the Opposition members and alliance partners of the DMK about the ban on the cough syrup

title: Bhoothathankettu hydro project: former CEA official to accompany KSEB team to China as independent expert
content: A long-drawn dispute with the Chinese suppliers of the third and final consignment of electromechanical components has delayed the commissioning of the 24 MW project

title: Rahul Gandhi calls for transparent probe into Zubeen Garg’s death, pays tribute to singer in Assam
content: Underlining the “tragedy faced by the whole of Assam”, the Congress leader said it was the State government’s duty to quickly and transparently investigate and tell the singer’s family members exactly what happened

title: Ouseppachan, Fakruddin Ali share stage with BJP leader B. Gopalakrishnan at Thrissur rally
content: Film composer praises national unity; BJP leader invites them to join party and contest Assembly polls

title: ‘Socio-educational survey not limited to backward classes’: CM Siddaramaiah lashes out at Narayana Murthy and Sudha Murty
content: Siddaramaiah remarked that the couple’s stance to not share information in survey seems to stem from some misunderstanding about its intent

title: Nothing new in PM Modi’s Kurnool speech; offers no tangible benefit to Andhra Pradesh: CPI(M)
content: CPI(M) State Secretary V. Srinivasa Rao accuses both the Centre and the State Government of indulging in “mutual praise and empty rhetoric”

title: Govt working on steps to improve supply of rare earth minerals: Piyush Goyal
content: "Look at Chile and Peru, think about it. Why am I doing FTA with them in the first place? It gives you the answer," he said when asked about steps the government is taking to deal with the shortage of these minerals

title: Muslim League is deeply infused with religion: Vellappally
content: SNDP Yogam general secretary says there is no other political party in Kerala as deeply infused with religion as the Muslim League.

title: Two accused in Zubeen Garg death case remanded to judicial custody
content: The duo was brought to court and later taken away in separate police vans, after the Kamrup Chief Judicial Magistrate remanded them to judicial custody

title: J&K CM Omar Abdullah reiterates demand for early restoration of statehood, says it would empower elected government
content: Omar Abdullah said one of his party colleagues has also come up with a bill on the issue of land grant, and he does not know whether that would also come up in the House or not

title: Our aim is to take domestic defence production to 100%: Rajnath Singh
content: India's defence export has reached a record ₹25,000 crore which was less than ₹1,000 crore few years ago, says Defence Minister

title: Amit Shah slams RJD for fielding Shahabuddin's son in Bihar polls
content: This development has been done together by PM Narendra Modi and CM Nitish Kumar. Before our government came here, migration, extortion, murders, and kidnappings were common, says Union Home Minister Amit Shah

title: India's Russian oil import rebound in Oct after dip in previous quarter: Kpler data
content: The data pertains to the period prior to U.S. President Donald Trump's statement claiming Prime Minister Narendra Modi has agreed to stop Russian crude imports

title: Banned cough syrup worth ₹2 crore recovered from goods train in Tripura
content: During the coordinated raid, the teams successfully recovered 90,000 bottles of banned Escuf syrup from two goods train wagons stationed at Jirania railway station in West Tripura, says police

title: NIMHANS holds State-level consultation on responsible digital use among students in Karnataka
content: Participants discussed patterns of technology overuse among students, and explored preventive and promotive measures to encourage healthy and ethical technology use

title: New Gujarat Cabinet sworn in: Harsh Sanghvi named Deputy CM, Rivaba Jadeja among new faces
content: Harsh Sanghvi took oath as the Deputy Chief Minister and the youngest to hold the position in the State’s history

title: Two dead, six injured in car-lorry collision near Aduthurai in Thanjavur district
content: The accident occurred around 5.45 a.m. when a car proceeding towards Thirukkadaiyur from Pollachi in Coimbatore district and a lorry headed for Kumbakonam collided

title: Uttarakhand High Court lifts 31-year-old ban on hiring contract workers at ONGC
content: The Centre claimed that the notification was issued following due process. However, the court found that there was no proper consultation and limited scrutiny, meaning the decision lacked sufficient factual basis.

title: Bengaluru engineering student arrested for raping senior in men’s washroom on campus
content: According to a senior police officer, the girl is a year senior to the accused, and the two had known each other for the past three months

title: Zubeen Garg’s death probe may take three months: Singapore Police
content: The country’s police force said it does not suspect foul play and advised people not to spread unverified information

title: Sabarimala artefacts misappropriation case: Court remands accused Unnkrishnan Potti to SIT custody
content: The magistrate examined the SIT’s request for Unnikrishnan Potti’s charge in camera. The judicial officer reportedly gave Mr. Potti 10 minutes to confer with his defence counsel

title: Hoax bomb threat to Vice-President C.P. Radhakrishnan’s residence in Chennai
content: The police swiftly responded, securing the area and carrying out extensive searches; no explosive was found on the premises, and authorities later declared the threat a hoax

title: Chargers' new 'Charger Power' alternate, Lions' all-black lead NFL Week 7 uniforms
content: it's the first time in franchise history the Chargers will wear a gold jersey . the look is meant to channel the energy and "progressive nature" of the air coryell days . on "Thursday Night Football," the Cincinnati Bengals are hosting their annual "White Bengal" game .

title: Premier League re-rank: Arsenal top; Spurs' unsustainable path
content: the premier league's new financial anchoring rule is proposed . it's a random, low-scoring sport where conversion rates fluctuate massively from game to game . there are so many ways you can get out over your skis by drawing too many conclusions before we get to Halloween .

title: The Playbook: Lineup locks, Shadow Reports for Week 7
content: the playbook for week 7 kicks off with the Steelers at the Bengals . this column features score projections, over/unders, win probabilities and, of course, easy digestible fantasy advice for seasonlong leagues and DFS . we have folded the Shadow Reports into the game-by-game breakdowns here .

title: LaMelo playing 70+ games and other bold predictions for 2025-26
content: our fantasy basketball experts tasked them with detailing their boldest predictions for 2025-26 . he's currently 85th on average in ESPN live drafts, and his ability to create offense for others is only growing . Miller's coaching staff already trust him to find his own shot .

title: NHL Power Rankings: Canes on top, one futures bet for each team
content: a panel of ESPN hockey commentators, analysts, reporters and editors send in a 1-32 poll based on the games through Wednesday . previous ranking: 2 Points percentage: 100% Hurricanes win the Stanley Cup (+800). the first two games showcased Carolina's depth .

title: Ranking the top 25 college football players midway through the 2025 season
content: a midseason top 25 is supposed to look like a major league baseball all-star team . it's hard to separate the flash in the pan from the real deal . a bunch of players we love didn't make the cut . the good news is that a few of the biggest names don't keep this hot start through December .

title: LCS Day 6 storylines, lineups, updates: Who will rule two-game Friday in MLB playoffs?
content: the Toronto Blue Jays extend their lead to 6–2 as Vladimir Guerrero Jr. goes deep in the sixth inning . the winning team moves one victory away from the World Series . defending champion los Angeles Dodgers could complete a sweep of the top-seeded Milwaukee Brewers .

title: Mock draft: Betts, Fudd or Miles at No. 1?
content: the WNBA is negotiating a new collective bargaining agreement with the union . the draft lottery, expansion drafts for Toronto and Portland and a mammoth free agency will have to take place before the 2026 draft . five of our top six selections in this mock were eligible to go in the 2025 draft, but all opted to return for a return trip .

title: A perfect Berkeley paradox: Big-money college football and an antiestablishment protest
content: activists began a tree-sit in 2006 to protest the removal of an oak grove next to the stadium . the patch of campus had embodied one of the many contradictions of Berkeley . "it was like a fricking circus," Tedford said recently .

title: 2025-26 coaching hot seat, retirement guide
content: bob greene: the tectonic shift that deals and revenue sharing have sparked in college sports has not spared the men's basketball coaching carousel and the hot seat discussion . he says it's now clear that patience is at an all-time low if new hires aren't cutting it after two years, they're likely getting forced out the door or at least under significant pressure .

title: Bontemps and Windhorst: The latest intel on the Lakers, Knicks, Rockets and more
content: the deadline for extensions for most eligible players is Monday at 6 p.m. ET . there's a lot of pessimism right now, even by normal standards . a star-studded free agent class in the summer of 2027 could all be available .

title: Flacco finds vintage form as Bengals win battle of 40-something QBs
content: the Bengals beat the Pittsburgh Steelers 33-31 in an AFC North showdown . the Cincinnati Bengals traded for quarterback Joe Flacco . he threw for 342 yards and three touchdowns in the win .

title: Week 8 preview: Ranking Heisman contenders, plus key matchups and top quotes
content: the third Saturday in October delivers a lot of good things in college football . the SEC figures to dominate the spotlight, as it often does, as Ole Miss and Georgia tangle between the hedges . there is also non-SEC action to monitor, including the USC - Notre Dame rivalry, which hopefully will extend beyond Saturday .
